T02D2420:36b-1: a'a yu pa ri raksha n'a ma /
T02D2420:36b-3: tshe sgrub pa'i gdams ngag ces bya ba /
T02D2420:36b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2420:36b-5: bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2420:36b-6: bcud len zhal gyi gdams pa yis //
T02D2420:36b-7: lus ngag rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T02D2420:36b-8: de med bsgrub bya grub min pas //
T02D2420:36b-9: des na thams cad 'bad pa yis //
T02D2420:36b-10: don ni thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D2420:36b-11: skabs 'byung tshe sgrub ba 'di ru bshad //
T02D2420:36b-12: mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma mnyam //
T02D2420:36b-13: snum pa'i snod la sbyar byas nas //
T02D2420:36b-14: nas kyi spang mar zhag gcig bzhag / de nas bton nas nye bar bza'/
T02D2420:36b-15: so dang sen mo zla drug gis //
T02D2420:36b-16: brjes 'gyur lo ni stong thub ste //
T02D2420:36b-17: rtags ni mig rno stobs ldan no //
T02D2420:36b-18: nye shing rtsa ba blang byas nas //
T02D2420:36b-19: grib skam zhib tu btags par bya //
T02D2420:36b-20: 'o ma'am zho dang sbyar byas nas //
T02D2420:36b-21: zho ni langs nas skrog par bya //
T02D2420:36b-22: mar sar blangs nas tho rangs bza' //
T02D2420:36b-23: zhag ni bdun nas rtags 'byung ste //
T02D2420:36b-24: bdun gnyis gyur nas nyi 'od ldan //
T02D2420:36b-25: bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig nas //
T02D2420:36b-26: 'bras bu nang sel lus yang ngo //
T02D2420:36b-27: lo drug tu ni bza' btung gis //
T02D2420:36b-28: rnam rtog bral zhing tshe 'grub bo //
T02D2420:36b-29: tho ras mu zi srang phyed ni //
T02D2420:36b-30: yungs kar mar khus btul nas bza' //
T02D2420:36b-32: sprin nag zho gnyis sbrul mig pa'i //
T02D2420:36b-33: khu bas mnyes nas gang bar bya //
T02D2420:36b-34: zhu rjes drug cu'i 'bras chan btang //
T02D2420:36b-35: 'o ma btung zhing tsha sngo spang //
T02D2420:36b-37: bhri da ga ra dza'i phye la ni //
T02D2420:36b-38: mar dang sbrang gi rtsi spyang nas //
T02D2420:37a-1: stong dag la bza' bar bya //
T02D2420:37a-2: skyur rtsang bcud can kha zas btang //
T02D2420:37a-3: zla ba drug tu zos gyur na //
T02D2420:37a-4: nad rnams sel cing nyis brgya thub //
T02D2420:37a-5: 'bras bu gsum dang lcags phye dang //
T02D2420:37a-6: de bzhin bhrid gar dza dang //
T02D2420:37a-7: ru rta dang ni cha mnyam ste //
T02D2420:37a-8: bhri da ga'i khu bas lde gur sbyar //
T02D2420:37a-9: grib skams phye ma bza' bar bya //
T02D2420:37a-10: reg pa dang ni sngo skyur spang //
T02D2420:37a-12: lcags kyi lhung bzed mar gyis bkang //
T02D2420:37a-13: lha shing rtsa ba'i shun lpags ni //
T02D2420:37a-14: zhib btags sbyar la lo gcig bzhag / gza' skar bzang po'i dus su bton //
T02D2420:37a-15: yi dam lha yi bsnyen pa bskyal //
T02D2420:37a-16: ra yi 'o ma btung bar bya //
T02D2420:37a-17: zla ba gsum na gnyer ma dangs //
T02D2420:37a-18: zla ba drug nas rlung shugs ldan //
T02D2420:37a-19: lo gcig sbyor bas tshe 'grub bo //
T02D2420:37a-20: 'bras bu gsum dang bhri nga ga'i phye //
T02D2420:37a-21: mar dang sbrang re tsi sbyar la bza' //
T02D2420:37a-22: sman nyid zhu ba'i dus su ni //
T02D2420:37a-24: mig rno nad med sum brgya thub //
T02D2420:37a-25: tho rangs aa ru gnyis dag dang //
T02D2420:37a-26: nyi ma phyed la ba ru ste //
T02D2420:37a-27: zhag dus skyu ru bzhi dag za //
T02D2420:37a-29: rnal 'byor kha zas ci nus btang //
T02D2420:37a-30: skra dkar gnyer ma nad med pas //
T02D2420:37a-31: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug nad med ldan //
T02D2420:37a-32: bya khyung lta bur mig rno 'gyur //
T02D2420:37a-33: 'bras bu gsum gyi lde gu ni //
T02D2420:37a-34: lcags kyi snod la bskus byas la //
T02D2420:37a-35: nyin mtshan gnyis ni khrus byas nas //
T02D2420:37a-36: mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar la bza' //
T02D2420:37a-37: lo gcig sbyor bas sum brgya thub //
T02D2420:37a-38: nad byang so dang sen mo brje //
T02D2420:37a-39: ko ki la lta bu'i skad ldan 'gyur //
T02D2420:37a-40: de phyir bdag nyid ko ki lar grags //
